name: bitMaskRead
description:
Performs a bitwise mask read operation.
 Returns an integer representation of the corresponding bits specified in the mask.

params.name: start
params.description: Start bit for the read mask (Integer in the range 0-31, inclusive)

params.name: length
params.description: Length of bits in the read mask (Integer in the range 0-31, inclusive)

examples.title: Bitwise Mask Read
examples.description: Uses the bitMaskRead function to read each of the corresponding bits specified in the mask

examples.title: Using non zero read mask start and length parameters
